description: The `registerOrganization` function (US-001) requires the core multi-tenancy security rules (TASK-007) to be in place to function securely.
mitigation_plan: Develop and test rules in the emulator before integrating with the function.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire user onboarding feature.

description: Completing registration (US-006) requires an invitation token to be generated by the invite user flow (US-004).
mitigation_plan: Define the token structure and API contract between the two functions early in the sprint.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks completion of the user invitation lifecycle.

description: The Supervisor's dashboard (US-037) is useless without attendance records to review, which are created by the check-in feature (US-028).
mitigation_plan: Sequence sprints logically so US-028 is completed before US-037 begins.
